name: Boxed In (itch) (Monsoonexe)
description:
The goal of the game is to get three large, box symbols in a row (similar to tic-tac-toe).  The Players pays for a game by pressing the green play button and pays 10 credits.

A box will become visible and show a symbol when the symbols in all four corners match or include a wild.  It takes all 4 corners showing a Wild for a box to reveal a Wild.

The Player's board is randomized each game. The number of Wilds the Player has also gets randomized each game.  The Player can touch or click on an existing symbol in a corner to change that symbol into a Wild.

This game is exceedingly generous to the Player.  To add to the House Advantage, the Player is sometimes dealt 0 moves and thus cannot manipulate the board.

This game was created for a class for the University of Nevada, Las Vegas.
